body.name: TUNISE Portable Handheld Fan, Neck Fan, 4000mAh Desk Fan, 180° Adjustable, 6 Speed Wind, Display Electricity in Real Time, USB Rechargeable Foldable Fan, Quiet Personal Fan with Power Bank Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 57 mins
features: 【Ultra-quiet & 6-speed adjustable】The hand-held fan is rechargeable, the noise is <15db, ultra-quiet, the 6-speed is adjustable, the wind speed is gradually increased from 1 to 5, and the 6-speed simulates natural wind, and automatically adjusts the wind speed to meet various usage scenarios. stay cool anywhere

【Super long working time】Hand-held fan, long-lasting battery life and rechargeable, 4000mAh large-capacity battery, can work continuously for 4-18 hours (depending on the gear), and it only takes 1.5 hours to fully charge

【Portable & Multiple Ways of Use】Hand-held small fan, you can hold it in your hand, or put it on the table, or hang it around your neck with the provided rope, the foldable design is convenient for you to carry while traveling

【Easy to use】Hand-held fan can be folded, adjust the air volume with one key, digital display of gear position and remaining power, can be used as a mobile power supply for emergency charging of mobile phones, notebooks and other mobile devices
【Summer Assistant】Portable hand-held fan, very suitable for use at home, office, travel, shopping, camping, easy to carry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight , good air flow, and great battery life.
reviews.reviewText: As someone undergoing hyperbaric chamber therapy, I often found the heat inside the chamber was getting to be quite high. This fan has been a lifesaver in keeping me cool and comfortable during my sessions. Its portable and that means I can easily take it wherever I need, from the therapy sessions to my car.I've found another great use for it - keeping my camera cool during podcast recordings. The fan operates pretty quietly.The battery life is about 7 hours on the highest speed setting (6). The quick charging time is a bonus taking only about 1 hour to fully charge. It has a display that not only tells you the speed but also the amount of battery left. Pretty cool.This fan is lightweight yet feels sturdy and well-constructed. The 180° adjustable feature is incredibly useful, allowing me to direct the airflow exactly where I need it whether that's on a table or in my hand.Although I haven't used the power bank capability yet, it's a feature I'm looking forward to trying out. It's always handy to have a backup power source for my devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Portable Cooling Solution
reviews.reviewText: This multifunctional fan offers a host of features that make it stand out in the crowded market of personal cooling devices. The six-speed wind settings provide a customizable cooling experience. I can easily switch between different speeds depending on the temperature and my preferences. The quiet operation is a big plus – it cools effectively without creating unnecessary noise, making it ideal for use in quiet environments or while working.The built-in 4000mAh battery is a substantial power source. Not only does it provide an extended operating time for the fan, but it also serves as a power bank. This dual functionality is incredibly convenient, ensuring that my devices stay charged when I'm on the go.The foldable design is a space-saving feature, making it easy to carry in my bag or pocket. The neck fan mode is particularly handy for hands-free use, providing a cool breeze without the need to hold it. I highly recommend it for its innovative design and reliable performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars air flow is fantastic
reviews.reviewText: **UPDATE..... changed to 5 stars, it was user error regarding the lanyard, you have to lay fan on counter and use both hands to hold fan and then push "pegs" into the slots. also, battery life is really good (for my use) i only use it for a couple minutes at a time (hot flashes) i charged it to 100% on Saturday evening and its still at 78% on Monday afternoon.color is nice, size is perfect, and surprisingly the air flow is fantastic. i like that it shows you how much battery life there is left and also when charging it shows when at 100%. the only bad thing is the lanyard. it does NOT fit into the slots made to hold it, so its useless. i'm sure i can make my own if needed so not really upset about it since the fan itself is so great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little thing is great. Has 6 speeds and the top really is powerful! Took it to Costa Rica for a week and the battery lasted a long time! Definitely worth the $

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good fan but not as powerful as the best out there
reviews.reviewText: This fan is second only to others that are slightly bigger or with better airflow. The material and design are top notch. The noise level is acceptable. If this is the first fan you bought then you're in good shape. But if you have the other "few" fans that are slightly more powerful then it's a hard decision. I would recommend the HandFan for the airflow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This helped me in college. I was able to utilize it in class as it’s quiet enough and stay cool. It works amazing for the size, super strong. It’s also very portable and the perfect size for travel/function!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful little fan!
reviews.reviewText: This fan has 6 speeds so the power can be adjusted. I love that it shows your battery life (nothing worse than running out of juice by surprise…) Can’t beat the price! I will be buying a few others so I will always have a backup.This is the very best personal fan I’ve had! (I’ve tried MANY!)*BONUS-this little fan also can be used as a power bank! There is an extra port to charge your phone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This handheld fan is making my life better! I'm having some fiery hot flashes as a result of some medical treatment. Its awful, lousy and disruptive. But having this 6-speed fan is a game-changer. It's powerful enough to cool me off until they pass and because of that I am so, so, so much more comfortable. It is well-designed, sturdy, feel good in my hand. The battery is very powerful and lasts forever. Ive had it for a week and I've kept it topped off but I didn't need to. For my use, a full battery could last a week or longer, in my estimation. I also love how you can rotate the fan back onto the base and set the fan on a nearby table and let it cool you hands-free. Awesome. I did this during a recent hour-long treadmill run and the cool breeze was a welcome and noticeable improvement (and this only used up about 15% of the battery). Overall I am very grateful to have this and impressed by its design and performance. Recommend!

La mejor compra que he hecho. Salva vidas en el calor!! Es cómodo, ligero, gran potencia (6 velocidades) y la carga de la batería dura bastante. El único “pero” es que tarda aproximadamente 4hrs en cargarse.
Tiene 6 velocidades. Bastante aire en todas las velocidades. Ligero y la batería dura mucho
Well made small fan. Very quiet with a number of settings. I have a medical condition and can’t tolerate hot environments so it’s a life saver!
